languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с нескрываемым гневом.{/n} "Присутствие Орудия Хаоса на мостике пустотного корабля — ересь, которую ты пытаешься оправдать практическими интересами. Знай же — именно из "практических интересов" люди, некогда бывшие верными слугами Трона, и превращаются в преступников. Твои привилегии — лишь тонкая вуаль над свершенным тобой святотатством".

{n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс смотрит на вас с нескрываемым гневом.{/n} "Присутствие Орудия Хаоса на мостике пустотного корабля — ересь, которую ты пытаешься оправдать практическими интересами. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te mira sin disimular su furia.{/n} «La presencia de un arma del Caos en el puente de una nave del vacío es una herejía, y encima la justifica afirmando que su interés es puramente pragmático. Es precisamente ese "interés pragmático" lo que convierte en criminales a personas que antaño eran siervos leales al Trono. Sus privilegios no son más que un transparente velo con el que pretende ocultar el sacrilegio que ha cometido».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

Es precisamente ese "interés pragmático" lo que convierte en criminales a personas que antaño eran siervos leales al Trono. Sus privilegios no son más que un transparente velo con el que pretende ocultar el sacrilegio que ha cometido».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは怒りを露わにしてこちらを見ている。{/n}「渾沌の兵器をヴォイドシップのブリッジに乗せるのは異端であるにも関わらず、純粋に実利的なものだとあなたは主張して正当化しようとしている。同じく“実利的な理由”で、これまで数々の玉座の忠実な下僕だった者たちが犯罪者に転じてきた。あなたの特権をもってしても、犯した冒涜を完璧に覆すことはできない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは怒りを露わにしてこちらを見ている。{/n}「渾沌の兵器をヴォイドシップのブリッジに乗せるのは異端であるにも関わらず、純粋に実利的なものだとあなたは主張して正当化しようとしている。同じく“実利的な理由”で、これまで数々の玉座の忠実な下僕だった者たちが犯罪者に転じてきた。あなたの特権をもってしても、犯した冒涜を完璧に覆すことはできない」

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着你，丝毫没有掩饰他的愤怒。{/n}“在虚空舰的舰桥上摆放混沌的武器，是一种显而易见的异端行为，而你却试图宣称这纯粹是出于你‘务实主义的兴趣’来将其正当化。然而，正是由于你所谓的‘务实主义的兴趣’，那些曾效忠于黄金王座的仆人才堕落成了罪人。至于你的特权，不过是你用来掩饰亵渎之举的薄纱罢了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着你，丝毫没有掩饰他的愤怒。{/n}“在虚空舰的舰桥上摆放混沌的武器，是一种显而易见的异端行为，而你却试图宣称这纯粹是出于你‘务实主义的兴趣’来将其正当化。然而，正是由于你所谓的‘务实主义的兴趣’，那些曾效忠于黄金王座的仆人才堕落成了罪人。至于你的特权，不过是你用来掩饰亵渎之举的薄纱罢了。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard empreint d'une colère flagrante.{/n} « La présence d'une arme du Chaos sur la passerelle d'un vaisseau est une hérésie que vous tentez de justifier en prétendant que votre intérêt pour elle est purement pragmatique. C'est précisément à cause d'un "intérêt pragmatique" que de fidèles serviteurs du Trône ont basculé dans la criminalité. Vos privilèges ne sont qu'un mince voile recouvrant le sacrilège que vous avez commis. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous lance un regard empreint d'une colère flagrante.{/n} « La présence d'une arme du Chaos sur la passerelle d'un vaisseau est une hérésie que vous tentez de justifier en prétendant que votre intérêt pour elle est purement pragmatique. C'est précisément à cause d'un "intérêt pragmatique" que de fidèles serviteurs du Trône ont basculé dans la criminalité. Vos privilèges ne sont qu'un mince voile recouvrant le sacrilège que vous avez commis. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix blickt dich mit unverhohlenem Zorn an.{/n} "Die Anwesenheit einer Waffe des Chaos auf der Brücke eines Raumschiffs ist Ketzerei. Und Ihr wollt das rechtfertigen, indem Ihr behauptet, Euer Interesse daran sei rein pragmatischer Natur. Gerade dieses 'pragmatische Interesse' ist es, das einst treue Diener des Throns zu Verbrechern werden lässt. Eure Privilegien sind nur ein dünner Schleier über dem Sakrileg, das Ihr begangen habt."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

Und Ihr wollt das rechtfertigen, indem Ihr behauptet, Euer Interesse daran sei rein pragmatischer Natur. Gerade dieses 'pragmatische Interesse' ist es, das einst treue Diener des Throns zu Verbrechern werden lässt. Eure Privilegien sind nur ein dünner Schleier über dem Sakrileg, das Ihr begangen habt."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. languages.text: {n}Heinrix, apaçık bir hiddetle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Uçsuz gemisinin köprüsünde bir Kaos silahı bulunması kabul edilemez. Bir de niyetinin tümüyle pragmatik olduğunu öne sürüp kendini haklı çıkarmaya çalışıyorsun. Bir zamanlar Taht'ın sadık hizmetkârı olanların suça bulaşması hep bu "pragmatik niyetlerden" olur ya. Bu günahını ayrıcalıklarınla örtbas edemezsin."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix looks at you with undisguised fury.{/n} "The presence of a weapon of Chaos on the bridge of a voidship is heresy, and you try to justify it by claiming that your interest is purely pragmatic. It is precisely because of 'pragmatic interest' that people who were once loyal servants of the Throne become criminals. Your privileges are but a thin veil drawn over the sacrilege you have committed."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, apaçık bir hiddetle sana bakıyor.{/n} "Uçsuz gemisinin köprüsünde bir Kaos silahının varlığı kabul edilemez. Bir de niyetinin tümüyle pragmatik olduğunu öne sürüp kendini haklı çıkarmaya çalışıyorsun. Bir zamanlar Taht'ın sadık hizmetkârı olanların suça bulaşması hep bu "pragmatik niyetlerden". Bu günahını ayrıcalıklarınla örtbas edemezsin."
